mod.name: octomod
mod.description: An octopus with choices to make.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Ink Spray
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Apply 1 Weak.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Ink Spray+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Apply 1 Weak.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Octo Boost
cards.description: Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.

cards.name: Octo Boost+
cards.description: Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Strike/Defend
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1:
Deal 6 damage.
Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Strike/Defend+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1:
Deal 9 damage.
Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Big Hug
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Apply 2 octomod:Constricted to ALL enemies.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Big Hug+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 3:
Apply 2 octomod:Constricted to ALL enemies.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Choke
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1:
Apply 3 octomod:Constricted.
Activate the enemy's octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Choke+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1:
Apply 3 octomod:Constricted.
Activate the enemy's octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Consideration
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1:
Next time you octomod:Choose this turn, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.
Next turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Consideration+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
octomod:Choose 1:
Next time you octomod:Choose this turn, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.
Next turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Double Slap
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal 9 damage.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Double Slap+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal 9 damage.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Flexability
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Gain 1 Strength this turn only.
Gain 1 Dexterity this turn only.

cards.name: Flexability+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 3:
Gain 1 Strength this turn only.
Gain 1 Dexterity this turn only.

cards.name: Flurry
cards.description:
Gain [E] .
Play the top card of your draw pile.
If it's a octomod:Choose card, octomod:Choose randomly.

cards.name: Flurry+
cards.description:
Gain [E] .
Play the top card of your draw pile.
If it's a octomod:Choose card, octomod:Choose randomly.

cards.name: Foresight
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
octomod:Choose 1:
Draw 1 card.
Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Foresight+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
octomod:Choose 2:
Draw 1 card.
Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Forethink
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Gain 4 Block.
Gain 4 Block next turn.

cards.name: Forethink+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Gain 6 Block.
Gain 6 Block next turn.

cards.name: Head Slam
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Your next card with octomod:Choose has an additional option to deal 7 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Head Slam+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Your next card with octomod:Choose has an additional option to deal 9 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Ink Spurt
cards.description:
Apply 2 Poison.
Apply 2 octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Ink Spurt+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Poison.
Apply 3 octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Mini-Strangle
cards.description: Apply 2 octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Mini-Strangle+
cards.description: Apply 3 octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Prepare
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prepare+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.

cards.name: Punch
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1:
Deal 10 damage.

cards.name: Punch+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1:
Deal 14 damage.

cards.name: Self Interest
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Gain 3 Block.
Upgrade a random card in your hand.

cards.name: Self Interest+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Gain 4 Block.
Upgrade a card in your hand.

cards.name: Spines
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
octomod:Choose 1:
Apply 1 Weak.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Spines+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
octomod:Choose 1:
Apply 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Sting Slap
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
octomod:Choose 1:
Apply 2 octomod:Constricted.
Gain 2 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Sting Slap+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
octomod:Choose 1:
Apply 2 octomod:Constricted.
Gain 2 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Strangle
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1:
Gain 6 Block.
Apply !octoMagic! octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Strangle+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Gain 4 Block.
Apply !octoMagic! octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Twin Sting
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1:
Deal 8 damage and apply 1 Weak.
Gain 6 Block and apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Twin Sting+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1:
Deal 10 damage and apply 1 Weak.
Gain 8 Block and apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Writhing Wrath
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal !secondDamage! damage.
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Writhing Wrath+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal !secondDamage! damage.
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Adaptability
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 4:
Gain 2 Block.
Deal 2 damage.

cards.name: Adaptability+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 6:
Gain 2 Block.
Deal 2 damage.

cards.name: Adaptoform
cards.description:
octomod:Choose X + 0:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Adaptoform+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose X + 1:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Arm Tangle
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
octomod:Choose 1:
Lose 3 HP.
Draw 1 less card next turn.

cards.name: Arm Tangle+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
octomod:Choose 1:
Lose 3 HP.
Draw 1 less card next turn.

cards.name: Arrow Flurry
cards.description:
Next turn, deal 8 damage.
Add a copy of this card into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Arrow Flurry+
cards.description:
Next turn, deal 8 damage and apply 1 Weak.
Add a copy of this card into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Auto-Turret
cards.description: Whenever you octomod:Choose, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Auto-Turret+
cards.description: Whenever you octomod:Choose, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Biggest Hug
cards.description:
Gain 6 octomod:Constricted.
Apply !octoMagic! octomod:Constricted to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Biggest Hug+
cards.description:
Gain 4 octomod:Constricted.
Apply !octoMagic! octomod:Constricted to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Blast Smash
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal 5 damage.
Lose 2 HP and deal !secondDamage! damage.

cards.name: Blast Smash+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal 6 damage.
Lose 2 HP and deal !secondDamage! damage.

cards.name: Blindside
cards.description:
Choose X + 0:
Randomize the costs of cards in your hand.
Gain [E] .

cards.name: Blindside+
cards.description:
Choose X + 1:
Randomize the costs of cards in your hand.
Gain [E] .

cards.name: Boosted
cards.description: Gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Boosted+
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Camouflage
cards.description:
Gain 2 Plated Armor.
Gain 2 Malleable.

cards.name: Camouflage+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Plated Armor.
Gain 3 Malleable.

cards.name: Cannon Shot
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Deal !secondDamage! damage to this Act's boss.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cannon Shot+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Deal !secondDamage! damage to this Act's boss.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Conjure
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal 6 damage.

Apply 1 Weak.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Conjure+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 3:
Deal 6 damage.
Gain 5 Block.
Apply 1 Weak.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:

cards.name: Crampage+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal 4 damage.
Increase this card's damage by !octoMagic! this combat.

cards.name: Decisive Hit
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Next time you octomod:Choose this turn, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.

cards.name: Decisive Hit+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.

cards.name: Deep Thought
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Gain [E] .

Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Deep Thought+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 3:
Gain [E] .
Draw 1 card.
Next turn, gain [E] .
Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Duplicate
cards.description:
The next card you play puts a copy of itself on top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Duplicate+
cards.description:
The next card you play puts a copy of itself on top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Friendly Feint
cards.description:
Enemy gains 16 Block.
Apply 5 octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Friendly Feint+
cards.description:
Enemy gains 8 Block.
Apply 5 octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Harden Body
cards.description:
Gain 3 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Harden Body+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Temporary_HP.
Your next card with octomod:Choose has an additional option to gain 4 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Heat Shield
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 3:
Gain 5 Block.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !octoMagic! damage back.

cards.name: Heat Shield+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 3:
Gain 6 Block.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !octoMagic! damage back.

cards.name: Influx
cards.description:
Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 2 additional times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Influx+
cards.description:
Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 2 additional times.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Lash
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 3:
Gain 5 Block.
Deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Lash+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 4:
Gain 5 Block.
Deal 5 damage.

cards.description:

cards.name: Leeching Acid+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Long Game
cards.description: The next 2 times you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time. Exhaust.

cards.name: Long Game+
cards.description: The next 2 times you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time. Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Octo Slam
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal 12 damage.
Deal !secondDamage! damage and gain [E] .

cards.name: Octo Slam+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal 15 damage.
Deal !secondDamage! damage and gain [E] .

cards.name: Rethink
cards.description:
Exhaust.
octomod:Choose 1:
Put a card from your draw pile on top of your draw pile.
Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Rethink+
cards.description:
Exhaust.
octomod:Choose 1:
Put a card from your draw pile on top of your draw pile.
Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.description:
Exhaust.
octomod:Choose 1:

cards.name: Special Skill+
cards.description:
Exhaust.
octomod:Choose 2:
Gain 1 Artifact.
Enemy loses 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Thorns.

cards.name: Squeeze Tighter+1

cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal 8 damage.

cards.name: Tangle+

octomod:Choose 2:
Deal 10 damage.

cards.description:
ALL enemies heal 15 HP.

cards.name: Tentaparty+
cards.description:
ALL enemies heal 15 HP.
Apply 9 octomod:Constricted to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Tighten

Can only be played if ALL enemies are octomod:Constricted.

Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Tighten+
cards.description:
Can only be played if ALL enemies are octomod:Constricted.

Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Tobey Maguire
cards.description: At the end of your turn, either gain 2 Block or deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Tobey Maguire+
cards.description:
Innate.

cards.name: Vengeful Splash
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.

cards.name: Vengeful Splash+

cards.name: Big Slap
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Big Slap+

Deal 20 damage.
Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

cards.name: Dish
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Did you know: You can commission Vex to make your custom character! Contact Vex'd#2468 on Discord for more info.

cards.name: Dish+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1 non-rare Octopus card(s).
Replace this card with those ones permanently.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Donu || Deca
cards.description:

octomod:Choose 2:

Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

Apply 1 Weak.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.

octomod:Choose 8:

Gain 2 Block.
Draw 1 card.
Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Ensnare+
cards.description:
Exhaust.
octomod:Choose 1:
Double the enemy's octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Extra Arm

cards.name: Extra Arm+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 1:
At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
The first octomod:Choose card you play each turn has 1 additional choice.

cards.name: Grand Fin-ale+
cards.description:

octomod:Choose -2:
Deal !secondDamage! damage.

cards.name: Hindsight
cards.description:
Your next card with octomod:Choose also has all the options of your last card with octomod:Choose.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hindsight+
cards.description:
Your next card with octomod:Choose also has all the options of your last card with octomod:Choose.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Indecisiveness
cards.description:
Whenever you octomod:Choose this turn, trigger the effects of ALL options.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Indecisiveness+
cards.description:
Whenever you octomod:Choose this turn, trigger the effects of ALL options.
Exhaust.

Exhaust.

cards.name: Ink Splat+
cards.description:
Enemy becomes Stunned.
You can't read choices until the end of your next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.description: Whenever you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.

cards.name: Kraken Form+
cards.description: Whenever you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 1 additional time.

cards.name: Life Tap
cards.description:
You may lose !octoMagic! HP, draw 1 card, and gain [E] any number of times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Life Tap+
cards.description:
You may lose !octoMagic! HP, draw 1 card, and gain [E] any number of times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Magnum Octopus
cards.description:
Exhaust.
Increase this card's Choose amount by 1 permanently.
octomod:Choose 1:
Apply 2 Constricted.
Gain 2 Block.

cards.name: Magnum Octopus+
cards.description:
Exhaust.
Increase this card's Choose amount by 1 permanently.
octomod:Choose 1:
Apply 2 Constricted.
Gain 2 Block.

cards.name: Mirror Body
cards.description:
Grave.
Whenever you receive damage, deal that much damage back.

cards.name: Mirror Body+
cards.description: Whenever you receive damage, deal that much damage back.

Next time you octomod:Choose, octomod:Choose 3 additional times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Power Pulse+
cards.description:

Exhaust.

cards.name: Shifting Octopus
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 2:
Deal 6 damage.
Gain 5 Block.
Next turn, gain 5 Block.
Apply 1 Weak.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Gain 1 Energy.
Next turn, gain 1 Energy.
Draw 1 card.
Next turn, draw 1 additional card.
Enemy loses 2 Strength this turn.
Gain 2 Strength this turn.
Upgrade a random card in your hand.
Exhaust a card in your hand.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 4 damage back.
Randomize the cost of your hand.

cards.name: Shifting Octopus+
cards.description:
octomod:Choose 3:
Deal 6 damage.
Gain 5 Block.
Next turn, gain 5 Block.
Apply 1 Weak.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Gain 1 Energy.
Next turn, gain 1 Energy.
Draw 1 card.
Next turn, draw 1 additional card.
Enemy loses 2 Strength this turn.
Gain 2 Strength this turn.
Upgrade a random card in your hand.
Exhaust a card in your hand.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 4 damage back.
Randomize the cost of your hand.

cards.name: Spiny Arms
cards.description: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Spiny Arms+
cards.description: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 octomod:Constricted.

cards.name: Treasure Chest
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Exhaust.

Ethereal.
Exhaust.
octomod:Choose 1:
